miic.core.miic_utils.lat_lon_ele_load¶

lat_lon_ele_load(filename)[source]¶

Load lat lon and ele from a tab delimited file.

This function load lat, lon and ele from a tab delimited file into a pandas DataFrame so that those informaiton can be retrived using its wide capabilities.

Parameters:filename (full path filename) – The file to load
Return type:DataFrame
Returns:df: Pandas DataFrame with stations name as index and lat, lon, ele as columns
